title: Dave Portnoy Regrets Selling Bitcoin — Wishes Barstool Invested $10 Million in BTC
description: Barstool Sports kingpin Dave Portnoy is experiencing a serious case of crypto regret, wishing that he hadn’t sold his bitcoin. He also wishes that his company, Barstool, had invested $10 million in the crypto. “I’m so mad at myself about bitcoin. I should be up like 75% in bitcoin,” he stressed. However, Portnoy revealed to […]

title: OpenAI’s valuation skyrockets to $80 billion with new deal
description: OpenAI has seen its valuation escalate to a staggering $80 billion, as the New York Times reported on February 17. This leap comes after the company’s latest transaction, a tender offer led by Thrive Capital. This strategic move is designed to raise additional funds while simultaneously offering OpenAI employees a chance to liquidate their shares, […]
